newsitem.title: TUNISIA: Tunisia's bourse pursues its downward trend.
newsitem.headline: Tunisia's bourse pursues its downward trend.

text.p: Tunis stock exchange index on Monday closed slightly down by 0.03 percent in higher but still thin trade, bourse sources said.
The 31-share index closed at 443.22 points, down from 443.35 on Friday.
Arab Tunisian Bank fell 0.76 dinar to 25 dinars.

Airline Tunis Air slid 0.5 dinar to 18.32 dinars with the exchange of 1,293 shares. Banque Internationale Arabe de Tunisie was down 0.36 dinar to 29.06 dinars. Banque du Sud edged lower 0.33 dinar to 10.83 dinars with 5,409 shares changing hands.
Palm Beach Hotels eased 0.25 dinar to 8.95 dinars.
Leasing firm Tunisie Leasing LEAS.TN gained 0.82 dinar to 30.6 dinars. Chemical firm Alkimia was up 0.7 dinar to 43 dinars.
Investment fund SPDIT-SICAF advanced 0.26 dinar to 13.78 dinars. Household firm Ateliers Mecaniques du Sahel rose 0.24 dinar to 8.24 dinars.
Societe Tunisienne de Banque was up 0.1 dinar to 12.4 dinars with the exchange of 2,073 shares.
Total traded volume was 7 dinars against 234,321 dinars.
